member.name: T:Sudoku.Concepts.TrueCandidate
member.summary: Defines a searcher that searches for the true candidates of the current sudoku grid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Concepts.TrueCandidate.GetAllTrueCandidates(Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get all true candidates when the number of empty cells is below than the argument.
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.exception: Throws when the puzzle is invalid.
